headline.print_headline: New Mexico: Police Say Man Admitted to Road-Rage Killing
headline.main: New Mexico: Police Say Man Admitted Road-Rage Killing

snippet: A man confessed to fatally shooting a 4-year-old girl while arguing with her father as the two men drove down a freeway in separate vehicles, the police said.
abstract: Tony Torrez confesses to fatal shooting of 4-year-old girl Lilly Garcia during argument with her father over a traffic incident on interstate highway in Albuquerque; charges against Torrez include murder, assault and child abuse.
lead_paragraph: A man confessed to fatally shooting a 4-year-old girl while arguing with her father as the two men drove down a freeway in separate vehicles, the police said.
